name: Zeus Is Mad
description:
Zeus' Rivals have grown jealous of his newly founded settlement, and are out to thwart your efforts to thrive. With the powers of Zeus, can you defend your Pantheon long enough to build a city worthy of a God?

Controls

- Hold left click to generate power for your lightning.
- The more powerful the bolt, the more favour you will earn, the faster your Pantheon will grow.
- If anyone reaches your altar they will taint your powers. (You have 3 lives)

Will your Pantheon be worthy of the Gods?

Thank you for checking out my game made for the r/Vive Winter's End Game jam hosted by nvmsocool. Any feedback is always appreciated. The theme was Electricity.

Skills have been planned and will be implemented in future builds.
